channel.title: Pages on Lalit Maganti

item.title: Lalit Maganti
item.description:
I’m a software engineer working at Google on Perfetto, the next generation performance tracing framework used by Chrome and Android. My main work is with the trace processor, a C++ library that ingests traces and exposes an SQL interface for querying events.

In my spare time, I tinker with projects from a variety of software engineering domains and write endless (largely unreleased) personal projects. I also play copious amounts of chess.
